value:
Your team reminds me of my old
unit. I hope I do them proud...
wherever they are now.

I was once one of the Ylissean
pegasus knights. The others all
died...but their spirits live on in me.

Your diligence is admirable, but
don't overexert yourself. You're
our only summoner, you know.

Can I watch you summon sometime?
I'd like to learn more about how I
came to be here.

I was just inspecting the armory.
Next I shall look over the mess
tent, the stables, and the latrines.

Ah, I'm glad I found you! I've come
to bid you greetings from your
friend $Nf.
Hard work is its own reward.
This was to be expected.

I'm sorry. You can expect
better from me next time.

Thank you for the trust you've put
in me. I vow to be worthy.

I'm Cordelia of the Ylissean army
under milord Chrom. I will do my
best to meet your expectations.

Let's see...to summon Heroes, first I'd
have to pose, then fire a shot like so...
Yes, I have the moves down perfec—$k$pAhhh! Were you watching me?
Why didn't you say something
sooner, $Nu?!$k$pHm? Because I let my guard down?
You're very rude to spy on me
like that!$k$pBut I must admit...it's nice that you
can see me this way and not just
as everyone's "natural talent."$k$pI won't let my guard down on the
battlefield, though. You are precious
to me, and I swear to protect you.
はっ！
ええいっ！
きゃっ…！
I can bear this...!
I can do this...
Now you've angered me!
I must prevail.
I see an opening!
Too...weak...
Heehee
I know what they say, but please don't call me a genius.
I wonder if there is any feeling worse than unrequited love?
I would like to join the Order of Heroes.
*sigh* Oh! Was I sighing again? I must work on that.
I do not appreciate being stared at. May I help you?
I must do my utmost...for myself and for those who protected me...
I want to learn more about this realm. About you as well.
Yes?
OK.
Understood.
